title: The Cure
description: Meryn Sanders is 22. She has been 22 for about 2000 years. That is what happens when you take the Cure. Aging stops. And Meryn is not the only one who has taken it. Across the world, people stopped dying from old age, resulting in a population boom that the planet could not handle. War over resources stained the earth, tainting it, making it almost unlivable.Now citizens must rely on the generosity of Zachary Kerofin, their president, to provide them with their basic needs. And he does. As long as everyone follows the rules. For Zach has a plan to fix the world, but it is not a solution many would approve of. But to accomplish it, first he must catch one of the greatest rule-breakers of all timeâ€¦
author: T.A. Loix
